name: Laurent-Perrier Cuvée Rosé Brut
description: Elegant rosé champagne with delicate pink hue. Notes of red berries, citrus, and floral aromas. Perfect for celebrations and special occasions.

name: Veuve Clicquot Brut
description: Iconic yellow label champagne. Rich and full-bodied with notes of brioche, vanilla, and citrus. A classic choice for any celebration.

name: Moët & Chandon Impérial Brut
description: The world's most loved champagne. Bright and fruity with notes of green apple, white flowers, and brioche. Perfect for any occasion.

name: Ruinart Champagne
description: The oldest champagne house, founded in 1729. Elegant and refined with notes of white flowers, citrus, and minerality.

name: Ruinart Blanc de Blancs
description: 100% Chardonnay champagne. Pure, elegant, and mineral with notes of white flowers, citrus, and chalk. A true expression of Chardonnay.

name: Laurent-Perrier La Cuvée
description: The signature cuvée from Laurent-Perrier. Fresh and elegant with notes of white flowers, citrus, and a delicate minerality.

name: Moët & Chandon Rosé Impérial
description: Elegant rosé champagne with a vibrant pink hue. Notes of red berries, rose petals, and a hint of spice. Perfect for romantic occasions.

name: Bollinger Special Cuvée
description: Rich and powerful champagne with notes of brioche, toasted almonds, and orchard fruits. A favorite of James Bond.

name: Krug Grande Cuvée
description: The ultimate expression of champagne. Complex and layered with notes of honey, toasted bread, dried fruits, and spices. A masterpiece of blending.

name: Dom Pérignon Vintage 2013
description: The legendary prestige cuvée from Moët & Chandon. Vintage 2013 offers notes of white flowers, citrus, and minerality with incredible finesse.

name: Moët & Chandon Grand Vintage Rosé 2016
description: Vintage rosé champagne from an exceptional year. Rich and complex with notes of red berries, rose petals, and a long, elegant finish.

name: Hennessy Very Special Cognac
description: The world's most popular cognac. Smooth and balanced with notes of vanilla, oak, and dried fruits. Perfect for sipping or mixing.

name: Grey Goose Vodka
description: Premium French vodka made from soft winter wheat. Exceptionally smooth with a clean, crisp finish. Perfect for cocktails or sipping.

name: Grey Goose L'Orange Vodka
description: Premium vodka infused with natural orange flavors. Bright and citrusy, perfect for refreshing cocktails or sipping over ice.

name: i.Stil Craft Irish Vodka 38
description: Premium Irish vodka crafted using traditional pot still methods. Smooth and clean with a distinctive character.

name: i.Stil Pot Still Vanilla Vodka 38
description: Premium Irish vodka infused with natural vanilla. Rich and smooth with warm vanilla notes, perfect for cocktails or sipping.

name: Belvedere Vodka
description: Premium Polish vodka made from 100% rye. Smooth and elegant with a clean finish. Produced from rye for exceptional character.

name: Corralejo Reposado Tequila
description: Premium 100% agave tequila aged in oak barrels. Smooth and complex with notes of vanilla, caramel, and agave. Made in Mexico.

name: Planteray Barbados Rum XO 20th Anniversary
description: Limited edition XO rum celebrating 20 years. Rich and complex with notes of tropical fruits, vanilla, and oak. A true collector's item.

name: Drumshanbo Single Pot Still Irish Whiskey
description: Triple distilled single pot still whiskey. Aged in Kentucky Bourbon and Oloroso sherry casks. Rich and complex with notes of spice and fruit.

name: Teeling Revival 14-Year-Old Single Malt Irish Whiskey
description: Commemorative single malt aged 14 years, finished in Pineau des Charentes casks. Non chill-filtered at 46% ABV. Notes of sweet pressed grape and dried fruit.

name: Tullamore D.E.W. 14-Year-Old Single Malt Irish Whiskey
description: Triple distilled single malt aged 14 years. Four cask finish: Old Bourbon, Oloroso Sherry, Port & Madeira. Rich and elegant complexity.

name: Bushmills Single Malt Irish Whiskey 1995 Marsala Casks
description: Rare single malt from 1995. Matured 10 years in Oloroso Sherry and Bourbon, then 15 years in Marsala casks. Cask strength, non chill-filtered. Notes of dried fruits, spices, caramelized brown sugar, and black coffee.

name: Writer's Tears Red Head
description: Single malt Irish whiskey triple distilled. Rich and complex with notes of fruit, spice, and oak. A unique expression from Walsh Whiskey.

name: Writer's Tears Copper Pot
description: Triple distilled Irish whiskey. Smooth and elegant with notes of honey, vanilla, and orchard fruits. Distilled, matured and bottled in Ireland.

name: Writer's Tears Double Oak
description: Irish whiskey aged in American and French oak casks. Rich and complex with notes of vanilla, spice, and toasted oak.

name: Midleton Very Rare
description: The pinnacle of Irish whiskey. A blend of the finest single pot still and single malt whiskeys. Exceptionally rare and refined.

name: Johnnie Walker Blue Label
description: A blend of our rarest whiskies. Only 1 in 10,000 casks from our unparalleled reserves. Rich spice, grilled sweetness, honey, caramel, hazelnuts, and dark chocolate with a long, smoky finish.

name: Glenmorangie Signet
description: A rare spirit of espresso intensity, aged in our most exceptional casks. Deep amber with notes of coffee, ginger, cinnamon, dark chocolate, tiramisu, and crystallized orange peel.

name: Glenmorangie Quinta Ruban 14 Years
description: Highland single malt aged 14 years in bourbon and port casks. Velvety, bold and deep with notes of dark chocolate, melted marshmallow and peppermint.

name: Glenmorangie The Lasanta 12 Years
description: Highland single malt aged 12 years in bourbon and sherry casks. Rich and warming with notes of honey, spice, and dried fruits.

name: Glenfiddich 18-Year-Old Single Malt
description: After 18 years in Oloroso sherry and bourbon casks, our aged malts are married in small batches for a rich and elegant complexity.

name: Midleton Very Rare Barry Crockett
description: A rare and exceptional Irish whiskey named after Master Distiller Barry Crockett. The pinnacle of Irish whiskey craftsmanship with exceptional complexity and refinement.
